DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of DP-R207 in patients with primary hypercholesterolemia.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy/Safety of DP-R207 Tablet Versus CRESTOR Tablet in Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Aged over 19 years Signed informed consent form At visit 1 and visit 2, LDLCholesterol ≤ 250mg/dL and Triglyderide ≤ 350mg/dL Has a history of hypersensitivity to HMGCoA reductase inhibitor and component of ezeimibe Liver transaminases > 2 x upper limit of normal
